mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sale_user_id AS "user.id", su.name AS "user.name", a.true_name AS "trueName", a.gender AS "gender", a.cell_phone AS "cellPhone", a.is_tenant AS "isTenant", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u1.login_name AS "createBy.loginName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u2.login_name AS "updateBy.loginName", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.login_name AS "loginName", a.login_pwd AS "loginPwd", a.nick_name AS "nickName", a.ID_NO AS "idNo", a.BIRTH AS "birth", a.AGE AS "age", a.PROFESSION AS "profession", a.CORP AS "corp", a.education AS "education", a.source AS "source", a.cust_bind_info_id AS "custBindInfoId"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN sys_user su ON su.id = a.sale_user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT a.id AS "id", a.sale_user_id AS "user.id", a.true_name AS "trueName", a.gender AS "gender", a.cell_phone AS "cellPhone", a.is_tenant AS "isTenant", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM t_customer a WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.cell_phone = #{cellPhone}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_customer( id, sale_user_id, true_name, gender, cell_phone, is_tenant, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, login_name, login_pwd, nick_name, ID_NO, BIRTH, AGE, PROFESSION, CORP, education, source, cust_bind_info_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{trueName}, #{gender}, #{cellPhone}, #{isTenant}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{loginName}, #{loginPwd}, #{nickName}, #{idNo}, #{birth}, #{age}, #{profession}, #{corp}, #{education}, #{source}, #{custBindInfoId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_customer SET is_tenant = #{isTenant} WHERE id = #{id}
